name: Garbostackers
description:
The description will be tomorrow!

LDJAM.com - can't keep with all the submissions, posting here as backup

04.10.2021   1:12     AM   MSK(GMT+3)

## Premise

Wanna get paid real money? Get yourself in that garbage hauler and squeeze some hot and wet garbage ...

Those guys from green corp. will pay you big money for fast and quality work! But be careful, hauler will crash if you will not place everything stable...

## Gameplay

You control special garbage press. Move and press down everything that lands on your garbage hauler.

## How to play

Move mouse on outside of vessel, to position your press.

LMB - to start pressing garbage.

When you feel like your truck is full, press RMB in middle of hauler, to switch it to next layer.

Hauler has 4 layers, when you fill up last one? press RMB in middle of hauler to end the run.

Game will end if you will be unstable for 5 sec or your path end (timer 10 mins)
